title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes not showing busy cursor
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip - The checkboxes in the table take a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state. During this process, a busy cursor should be shown.
OB: The checkboxes in the table take a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state. During this process, a busy cursor should be shown.
EB: The checkboxes in the table should update their checked state quickly (within a few seconds) and a busy cursor should be shown during the update.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open a workspace with many projects. 2. Go to the export options and choose 'Export Zip'. 3. Select all the projects. 4. Choose the desired file types. 5. Click 'Ok'.
